tasks_for_cycle_planner.title: Test Full Soft Onboarding Workflow
tasks_for_cycle_planner.description: Test the complete soft onboarding workflow with the fixed service. Verify all 6 steps work correctly: click chat input, save session, cleanup prompt, open new tab, navigate to onboarding, paste message. Test both single agent and multiple agent scenarios.
tasks_for_cycle_planner.verification: Service imports successfully, nested lock fixed, circular import resolved

tasks_for_cycle_planner.title: Disk Space Management Operations
tasks_for_cycle_planner.description: Original mission: Make space on C drive or use D drive. All agents have been soft-onboarded (workaround completed). Now proceed with disk space management operations. Analyze disk usage, identify cleanup opportunities, implement space-saving measures.

tasks_for_cycle_planner.title: Update Onboarding Documentation
tasks_for_cycle_planner.description: Update onboarding documentation to reflect that the service is now available for automated workflows. Document the lazy import pattern, nested lock detection, and best practices. Update usage examples and troubleshooting guides.
tasks_for_cycle_planner.documentation: Update docs to reflect service availability

tasks_for_cycle_planner.title: Service/Handler Architecture Improvement
tasks_for_cycle_planner.description: Consider architecture improvements for better separation of concerns between service and handler. Service should own operations, handler should be thin wrapper. Consider extracting common operations to shared module to reduce coupling.
tasks_for_cycle_planner.note: Not blocking, but would improve architecture

tasks_for_cycle_planner.title: Audit Codebase for Other Circular Imports
tasks_for_cycle_planner.description: Search codebase for other potential circular import issues. Apply lazy import pattern where appropriate. Document findings and fixes.

notes: All soft onboarding technical blockers resolved. Service ready for automated workflows. Original disk space management mission ready to proceed. Gas pipeline healthy.
